com.controller.entities

Class EntityController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.controller.entities.EntityController
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    EnemyController, HeroController, PowerupController, ProjectileController

    public class EntityController
extends java.lang.Object
    The Default Entity for all controllers. All controllers extend from this class, and all the bodies have some kind of extended EntityController as their Data.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      EntityController(float x, float y)
      Constructor for a default Entity Controller.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void activate()
      Necessary for Powerups.
      java.lang.String getType()
      Gets EntityModel Type, be it "ENEMY", "HERO", or other.
      float getX()
      Get current X coordinate.
      float getY()
      Get current Y coordinate.
      boolean isFlaggedForDelete()
      Returns whether this model and its associated body is flagged for deletion.
      void kill()
      When a model is destroyed, this sets it as flagged for deletion, and in the next render, both the models and it's respective bodies will be deleted in the appropriate place.
      void resurrect()
      Set flaggedForDeleteTrue.
      void setPosition(float x, float y)
      Sets the current position whenever it needs to be updated.
      void setType(java.lang.String type)
      Sets EntityModel Type, be it "ENEMY", "HERO", or other.

      • kill

        public void kill()
        When a model is destroyed, this sets it as flagged for deletion, and in the next render, both the models and it's respective bodies will be deleted in the appropriate place.
